channel.title: CVE Feed for Palo Alto Networks -- Bridgecrew Checkov
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Palo Alto Networks -- Bridgecrew Checkov

item.title: CVE-2021-3035|2024-08-03T16:45:50.739Z -- palo%20alto%20networks -- bridgecrew%20checkov
item.description: An unsafe deserialization vulnerability in Bridgecrew Checkov by Prisma Cloud allows arbitrary code execution when processing a malicious terraform file. This issue impacts Checkov 2.0 versions earlier than Checkov 2.0.26. Checkov 1.0 versions are not impacted.

item.title: CVE-2021-3040|2024-08-03T16:45:50.966Z -- palo%20alto%20networks -- bridgecrew%20checkov
item.description: An unsafe deserialization vulnerability in Bridgecrew Checkov by Prisma Cloud allows arbitrary code execution when processing a malicious terraform file. This issue impacts Checkov 2.0 versions earlier than Checkov 2.0.139. Checkov 1.0 versions are not impacted.
